page.content:
Go Team !
Thank you for using the ProSphere Custom Uniform Configurator. Your uniform has now been added to your cart. Please proceed to checkout or “Create an Away Uniform” in contrasting colors. Our speed depends on the speed with which the proofs are approved. If you just approved your design online, or are waiting for the email proof, ProSphere 7 or 14 day manufacturing will start when we receive your approval. If you have any questions about your order, please contact ProSphere Customer Service at (800) 509-0194.
